name: d2l-time-picker
description: Accessible, Localized Time Picker Input Element

scripts.test: npm run test:lint && polymer test --skip-plugin sauce
scripts.test:lint: npm run test:lint:wc && npm run test:lint:html
scripts.dump:galen:local:run: npm run galen -- dump test/acceptance/galen.test.js -g factory:local -d test/acceptance/dumps
scripts.galen:local:run: npm run galen -- test test/acceptance/galen.test.js -g factory:local -- -p4
scripts.galen:sauce:run: sc-run -- npm run galen -- test test/acceptance/galen.test.js -g factory:sauce -i SAUCE_USERNAME SAUCE_ACCESS_KEY TRAVIS_REPO_SLUG TRAVIS_BUILD_NUMBER -- -p4
scripts.dump:galen:local: concurrently -p name -n serve,galen -s first -k "polymer serve -p 8080" "npm run dump:galen:local:run"
scripts.test:galen:local: concurrently -p name -n serve,galen -s first -k "polymer serve -p 8080" "npm run galen:local:run"
scripts.test:galen:sauce: concurrently -p name -n serve,galen -s first -k "polymer serve -p 8080" "npm run galen:sauce:run"

author: D2L Corporation
